name: TMJTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The human jaw is a VERY important structure in the body! It is the primary structure for chewing food, and helps you breathe, speak, and express your emotions. This flash briefing gives you tips on how to optimize the function of your jaw, delivered personally by your TMJ Expert, Doctor Jeff Dolgos. Doctor Dolgos is a general dentist who has been treating TMJ dysfunction for more than 20 years. And not only is he a TMJ Doctor...he is a TMJ experiencer!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
